tool_description: Manages patient emergency contact information including contact details, relationships, and priority ordering for medical emergencies.

relationship.description: Relationship to patient (spouse, parent, child, sibling, friend, other)

phone_number.description: Primary contact phone number in XXX-XXX-XXXX format

error_messages: Invalid patient ID: Patient must exist in the system.
Invalid contact name: Name must contain only letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes.
Invalid relationship: Must be one of [spouse, parent, child, sibling, friend, other].
Invalid phone format: Phone number must follow XXX-XXX-XXXX pattern.
usage: Provide patient ID, contact name, relationship, and phone number to register emergency contact information. Ensure contact information is current and accessible.

contact_id.description: Unique identifier for emergency contact record

verification_status.description: Status of contact information verification (verified, unverified, invalid)
